short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast forward Ziggo GO streams without restrictions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imagine having to sit through 12 minutes of commercials while you're anxiously waiting to see who Kees van der Spek is gonna thonk on the head. With this extension, your troubles will be gone and your life will be better. Ever so slightly.
